title: Does Greta Thunberg write her speeches? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why wouldn’t she be the author? She’s just as articulate when speaking off the cuff and unscripted. To my mind, this is one amazing kid. That she is a 16-year old Swedish girl who has better command of English than a certain American - well, that must must chap his ass. We won’t speak to intelligence. She blows him away. Sixteen years old, female, citizen of one of those “socialist” European countries - and she commands a degree of international respect and admiration which said certain American envies and resents. I’d wager he manifests a nervous tic when he hears her voice. Betcha he no longer wants to be Swedish.

If you watch her you will see that she is extremely quick to make intelligent impromptu responses to idiots, so I imagine she either drafts them entirely or mostly herself. This makes her unusual as most politicians get others to write them. Famous examples are Kennedy and Roosevelt. Though one cannot imagine the drivel Trump comes out with was written by anyone sane.

I have not one clue, and I could not care less. Her message is right on point, her courage is stellar, and if she has the intelligence and ego strength to use advisers about presenting those ideas and speech writers to help her put them down and polish them, that puts her head and shoulders above trump and the clones and clowns with whom he chooses to surround himself. Having said that, I have no difficukty believing she authors her own work from start to microphone.
Very unlikely. Her speeches are far to advanced to be created by a 16-year old high-schooler, even by an exceptional student.
Man, this little girl really have the troll farms panties in a bunch, doesn’t she? I think your bosses met their match!
